xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.11 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiduka » 10.11.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
Mahantaraduka
Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
317.
3095Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (Yathā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
3096Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattidukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 10.11.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup10.12 Ajjhattikaduka >>
